title: undefined method `options_file='
body:
rspec-core version: 2.0.0.beta.19

```
    /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/configuration_options.rb:22:in `send': undefined method `options_file=' for #<RSpec::Core::Configuration:0x103795eb0> (NoMethodError)
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/configuration_options.rb:22:in `configure'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/configuration_options.rb:21:in `each'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/configuration_options.rb:21:in `configure'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:15:in `run'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/runner.rb:46:in `run_in_process'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/runner.rb:37:in `run'
from /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.19/lib/rspec/core/runner.rb:10:in `autorun'
from ./spec/controllers/admin/my_controller_spec.rb:3
```

Solution:

in lib/rspec/core/configuration.rb add the following line

```
    add_setting :options_file
```
